documents.document: @AfricaCDC and @ASLM_News convened participants from the Ministries of Health, Agriculture, and Environment of 14 MS on the 31st of March 2021 for the @FlemingFund EQuAFRICA training on the ISO 17025 standard to strengthen their AMR QMS and processes for ID and AST. https://t.co/Zf0ZzAJHMc

@AfricaCDC and @ASLM_News convened participants from the Ministries of Health, Agriculture, and Environment of 14 MS from 27-29 April 2021 for the @FlemingFund EQuAFRICA training on the ISO 17043 standard to strengthen their capacity for establishing National AMR EQA/PT programs. https://t.co/DHH6g6Cuhl

3/3 *At least 35 laboratory personals (animal human health professionals) from Ethiopia will have skills on the laboratory quality Mngmt system. *Roll out of LQMS capacity to develop quality culture in Ethiopia *Developing strengthening of the existing quality Mngmt system.
2/3- The broad objective of ensuring continuous improvement of the laboratory quality diagnosis, investigation and examination processes in line with the One Health approach.
1/3- Laboratory Quality Management System Laboratory Mapping Using the One Health Approach during COVID-19 pandemic in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia from 26th to 30th April 2021. https://t.co/BvyUurZBq5

~1.3 billion doses of vaccines are used annually. Africa represents ~25% of global demand. #VaccinesForAfrica #NewPublicHealthOrder #AfricaResponds https://t.co/E7lkW5Th6g
We need to remove the potential barriers of vaccine manufacturing in Africa. #VaccinesForAfrica #NewPublicHealthOrder #AfricaResponds https://t.co/LRTDV3ygo6 https://t.co/YzkxqCtCK2

99% of doses of vaccines used in Africa are imported. Only 1% or ~12 million doses are manufactured in Africa. Dr @JNkengasong, Director @AfricaCDC. #VaccinesForAfrica #NewPublicHealthOrder #AfricaResponds https://t.co/LRTDV3ygo6

The need of manufacturing vaccines in Africa is guided by 3 dimensions. The impact of COVID-19 specific disease outbreaks; Strong demand growth Economy security; Emerging re-emerging outbreaks. Dr @JNkengasong, Director @AfricaCDC #NewPublicHealthOrder #VaccinesForAfrica https://t.co/5YFJBUVZgu
